verses.1: Pilna a deihte, kithuhilh ding ut uh a, kitai ding ut lohna pen haina ahi hi.
verses.2: Mihoihte in Topaʼ maipha ngah a, siatna a gamtate amah in a mawhsak hi.
verses.3: Gitlohna in lungmuanna piangsak lo a, thuman mite lungmuang takin om uh hi.
verses.4: Zi hoih pen a pasalʼ minthanna le lungdamna hi a, a pasal a maizumsak zi pen a pasal adingin a dam thei lo guhnatna tawh kibang hi.
verses.5: Thuman mite in a kilawm a kituakin hong bawl a, migilote bek in hong khem nuam hi.
verses.6: Migiloteʼ thugente mi thahnopna bekbek hi a, midikteʼ thugente in lauhuaina sunga om mite a hon khia hi.
verses.7: Migilote in sihna tuakin cimang a, thuman mite nungta-in khang kizom hi.
verses.8: Mipilte kiphatin kipahtawi a, mihaite kineu-et hi.
verses.9: Nektawm ding nei lopi-in mi lian bangin omna sangin nuntak nading na semin mi mawkmawk hihna hoih zaw hi.
verses.10: Midikte in a gannote hoihtakin don a, migilote in a gannote bawlsia hi.
verses.11: Nakpi takin lokhote in an hau a, man nei lopi-in hun beisakna in haina ahi hi.
verses.12: Migiloteʼ belh mun muanhuai pen lei khal bangin kitamzan a, mihoihteʼ zung kip tawntung hi.
verses.13: Migilote in a zuaugenna uh awk pih a, thuman mite buaina tawh kipelh hi.
verses.14: Mite in kam hoih pauna hangin thaman ngah uh a, a sepna bangun zong thaman ngah uh hi.
verses.15: Mihaite pen amau mah thuman kisa tawntung a, mipilte in miʼ thugenna ngai nuam uh hi.
verses.16: Mihaite in a hehna uh langsak pah uh a, mipilte in a hehna uh ip zo hi.
verses.17: Thuman mite in thu taktak mah gen uh a, zuau tecite in khemna thu bek gen uh hi.
verses.18: Ngaihsun lo-a kampauna in tem hiam bangin mi liamsak thei a, mipilteʼ kampauna in tua bang liamna damsak thei hi.
verses.19: Thuman genna kip tawntung a, thuzuau genna tomno sung bek kimang hi.
verses.20: Thusia ngaihsunte lungkham uh a, thuhoih vaihawmte lungdam uh hi.
verses.21: Thuman mite tungah thusia tung lo a, migilote lungkhamna tawh kidim hi.
verses.22: Topa in zuaugen mite mudah a, mi citakte tungah a lungdam hi.
verses.23: Mipilte in a theihna uh im khinkhian a, mihaite in a haina uh pho laklak hi.
verses.24: Mi thanuamte vanglian a, mi thadahte sila suak hi.
verses.25: Lunghihmawhna in lungkhamna piangsak a, kampau hoih in mi lungdamsak hi.
verses.26: Midikte in a gamtatna uh tel et a, migilote a gamtatna un lam pialsak hi.
verses.27: Thadahte a tup tung ngei lo a, a thanuamte in a deih ngah hi.
verses.28: Mi thumanteʼ gamtatna in nuntakna piangsak a, mihaiteʼ gamtatna in sihna piangsak hi.
